ref: 5408 *jhūra ʻ wasted away, worn -- out ʼ. &rcirclemacr S. jhūru ʻ old, ancient ʼ; N. jhuro ʻ brittle ʼ, sb. ʻ dry leaves for fire, crumb ʼ; A. zur -- zur ʻ fine particles ʼ; B. jhurā ʻ crumbled ʼ, sb. ʻ crumb ʼ; Or. jhura ʻ crumb ʼ; Mth. jhūr ʻ burnt, disgusted ʼ; H. jhūrā ʻ withered, dried up ʼ; M. j̈hūr n. ʻ small particles of rice (when husking) ʼ.
